categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Yuletide Squadron was a starfighter squadron that served as part of the Rebel Alliance's starfighter corps during the Galactic Civil War. On a Life Day during or before 4 ABY, a Yuletide Squadron pilot accompanied by R2-D2 encountered the Jedi Master Yoda on a snow-covered Dagobah.
Yuletide Squadron was first mentioned in the 2019 LEGO toy set "Christmas X-Wing". This set was meant to be a festive version of the original 1999 LEGO Classic Star Wars X-Wing Fighter.
